description:
Yuka`s mom wants to have a boy who was Yuka`s childhood friend come over to be her tutor, but Yuka is against the idea, leading to an argument. Yuka seems to be acting much more adamant then usual. Then the boy in question drops by...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Geki Oko! Kateikyoushi Nante Iranai! Dechi!
Outrage! I Don`t Need a Home Tutor!
ゲキオコ! 家庭教師なんていらないっ! でち!
